Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory117.png'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'All cabin lock status have been reconfigured to lock...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'But only 72% of compartments are online now.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'We still have no information... on the whereabouts of those troops expunged by the space station...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Constructs can adapt to space. All the commandants participating in this mission also have dedicated space equipment.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "The life-support system should last them until they're rescued.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'But before that, they could only wander alone in space.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Thank goodness...', 3: '19', 4: 'We need to finish this mission ASAP.', 5: '19'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Let's complete the mission as soon as possible, so we can contact Celica and get everybody home...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory112.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I copied the space station's log data while waiting for the lock to activate.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Given that the database was also contaminated, I don't know how much useful information we can find.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I'll leave it to you to filter the data, Liv.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'The log actually recorded how the space station arrived at this state...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'The station failed to stop Punishing Virus from invading its gravity core, which resulted in gravity disorder.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'It destroyed the structure and continued to attract nearby Punishing Virus...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'A high-density matter was created in the gravity core. It was formed by a large amount of Punishing Virus...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'According to the log, this process is called Heteromerization, and this high-density body is hence named Punishing Heteromer.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'The scary thing is, these Heteromers can gather and disperse at will while maintaining high coordination with one another.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'It was also recorded that a cross-shaped enemy would control nearby Heteromer particles to form various Corrupted that were seen on Earth.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Which means we have been fighting Punishing Virus itself...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia clenches her blade.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...This information is incredibly important to humanity.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'The Punishing Virus evolved...', 3: '43', 4: 'We need to tell the world about this.', 5: '43'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Soon, we will have to face more than just information...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'All ally signals are moving toward the gravity device in the core.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'We must not fall behind.', 4: '1'}
